VIII El6szc'>

kc'myve kive'm 1611111, 6 0161γ11ὥ1 110105οκ, 901111κ050κ 65 11610261-

211616 (16 01600501156 616 69050101 (16 Neeulai Iorga 51 9011110616 00 591111001
111101516110101 de 105110οῒ16 9001106. Βο001651ῑ, 1895-1897, Vol. I—III.

1510116 11οο1101101» οΖ10160 6016 ki 5 611061 6(1(11ς616 8-16111 25 110161 161601 meg.

(115265 kiaddsban 5 6Ζ1 1115116116 0161 eddig ne'zgy 1116511( 110161.
